fields.name: organizationName
fields.label: Organization Name
fields.description: The official name shown across the site

fields.name: shortBio
fields.label: Short Bio
fields.description: Brief intro shown on home page (2-3 sentences)

fields.name: fullBio
fields.label: Full Biography
fields.description: Complete story shown on About page

fields.name: color
fields.label: Color Class
fields.description: CSS class: bg-primary, bg-accent-honey, or bg-secondary

fields.name: currentAmount
fields.label: Amount Raised ($)
fields.description: Update this as donations come in

fields.name: active
fields.label: Show Campaign on Site
fields.description: Toggle to show/hide the campaign banner

fields.name: category
fields.label: Category
fields.description: Which gallery tab should show this photo

fields.name: label
fields.label: Tab Label
fields.description: What users see (e.g., Community, Nursery School)

description.value: References another document, used as a foreign key
